attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's be fair, the honours system is clearly flawed in that so many minor 'celebrities' & people who haven't really contributed much to the country or people, are rewarded with honours. Yet here we have an author who is clearly the finest of the last 25 years & has a huge following, so do the right thing & sign up!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
